homepage.heading: Faster Way to Build Projects
homepage.description: Jumpstart with this Next.JS TypeScript multi-purpose boilerplate. Next.JS, TypeScript, deployment helpers, linters, SEO helpers, multilingual web apps  and pure pop-up layouts make building web applications a breeze. Expand and customize as needed to fit project's unique requirements.

feature-blocks.heading: Next.js + TypeScript
feature-blocks.description: Create web applications by extending the latest React features using flexible React framework, Next.JS. That gives you building blocks to create fast web applications with TypeScript.

feature-blocks.heading: Ready to Go.
feature-blocks.description: Implemented and ready to go features & helpers like SEO, i18n, layouts and much more. Feel free to expand and customize as needed to fit project's requirements.

feature-blocks.heading: Easy.
feature-blocks.description: Easy deployment to anywhere in any environment. Auto Subpath support. Static export. Serverless. Ready to use linters & prettier, no configuration required.
